## The countdown is on! AI Dev Days is just around the corner, happening 10â€“11 December as a two-day virtual event designed for AI developers, builders, and creators. This is your chance to dive deep into the latest innovations across Azure, Microsoft Foundry, GitHub, and VS Code and connect with some familiar faces along the way! @April Gittens, @Gustavo Cordido, @Olivia Guzzardo McVicker

#### **Whatâ€™s in Store?**

[Day 1 â€“ 10 December:](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26536/) [Video Link](https://www.youtube.com/live/GCLYC5d7kpI?si=1SZmVVO0qFAzsSOW)

*Building AI Applications with Azure, GitHub, and Foundry* Explore cutting-edge topics like:

- **Agentic DevOps**
- **Azure SRE Agent**
- **Microsoft Foundry**
- **MCP**
- **Models for AI innovation**

[Day 2 â€“ 11 December Agenda:](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26537/) [Video Link](https://www.youtube.com/live/GCLYC5d7kpI?si=1SZmVVO0qFAzsSOW)

*Using AI to Boost Developer Productivity* Get hands-on with:

- **Agent HQ**
- **VS Code & Visual Studio 2026**
- **GitHub Copilot Coding Agent**
- **App Modernisation Strategies**

#### **Why Join?**

- **Hands-on Labs**: Apply the latest product features immediately.
- **Highlights from Microsoft Ignite & GitHub Universe 2025**: Stay ahead of the curve.
- **Global Reach**: Local-language workshops for LATAM and EMEA coming soon.

Youâ€™ll recognise plenty of familiar faces in the lineup â€“ donâ€™t miss the chance to connect and learn from the best!
